attributes.action: Take whatever steps required to make our streets, towns villages and cities safe again for citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To acknowledge the fact that our streets feel unsafe and that young people no longer fear the consequences of crime. Look at punishment,civil and military service and making the consequences real and transparent so that it is a genuine deterant to those thinking of harming the people of the uk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
